divs: Sighting Details1.I went outside to look to see if I could see the Meteor shower. 2. I looked up to the sky and noticed a red flashing almost glittering light. 3.I thought it was a star with something red flashing in it. 4. The object at first was hovering, then when it moved it went right to left in a zig zag pattern. 5.I was speechless, couldn't believe what I was seeing. 6. vanished
Summary: star like,red light in center strobe like with outer light white. Did not follow strait line, zigzagged.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Kouts
This sighting has never been favorited.
